job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: I am hiring #DataScientist in #Seattle WA for a renowned #pharmaceutuical client.Qualification and Experience:â¢	BS degree with 4+ years of experience, a M.Sc. degree with 2+ years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science, Bioinformatics or similar fieldsâ¢	Strong desire to learn with an interest in immuno-oncology and cellular therapyâ¢	Experienced in interdisciplinary collaborations at the interface of data science and life sciencesâ¢	Proficient in good coding practicesâ¢	Command of data science stack of tools: R/Python, notebooks and gitâ¢	Experience with R Shiny, Dash, Plotly, Streamlit, or other reactive visualization frameworkâ¢	Experience with APIs, or ability to quickly learn how to use them (e.g., R httr or Python requests)â¢	Experienced in data visualization and analyticsâ¢	Experienced in setting up data workflows that interface with diverse ecosystem of data platforms and APIsâ¢	Computing proficiency: Base knowledge of Linux OS and interaction with cloud-resources particularly AWSPreferred: â¢	Experience with practicing Agileâ¢	Preferred: Experience with clinical data practices and standardsâ¢	Preferred: Experience working with omics and/or flow cytometry dataâ¢	Preferred: Experience with CI/CD framework and SQL
